Azure Discovery
Day: Sydney

13th Sept 2016
9:00 am - 5:00 pm AEST

find out more →

Microsoft Solution

Using underwater sensors and local weather information, The Yield collects and passes this data to Microsoft's Azure cloud platform.

Through a combination of Microsoft's Machine learning and internet of things solutions, Oyster farmers are given usefull information about the best time to harvest - Thus maximising potential.

This infromation informs schedules based on Oyster tides as well as tracking the ongoing health management of their oyster farms.
